title: Should I watch pornography to improve our sex life?
itunes:title: Should I watch pornography to improve our sex life?
description:
Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband told her she should look at pornography in order to improve their intimate life together and wants to know an Islamic view point on the subject.

 

To ask a question of your own visit: www.wivesofjanah.com/askaquestion
